description.value: You have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede your foes. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Debilitating Bomb], add the following to the list of effects you can choose from: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}, or a â€“15-foot status penalty to Speeds.

rules.text: If your bomb hits, the target must succed at a Fortitude save against your Class DC, or suffer one of the following @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.True Debilitating Bomb]{effects}. If you apply the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Debilitating Bomb], the target must critically succeed at its save to avoid the condition.
